caption.title: Climatology of annual maximum snow water equivalent.
caption.p: ( a) Average of four land surface reanalyses. ( b) Average of 50 global climate model simulations from the ALL ensemble. The period considered is that of maximal overlap between the reanalysis products (1982–2010). The orange contours are topographic height in kilometers. The outer contour is 1,500 m and the inner contours are in increments of 500 m.
